channel.title: [508] need some help [508]
channel.description:
hey, i need some help with my 508 server. i just started coding on a 508 source and a have some questions.
1, im using mithscape v1 source, were can i find the quests. (to edit them)
2, can i change item names? if i can how do i do that.
3, is there any way to change char safes? cuz if i change the main safe the char will be resetted.
4, is it possible to make a player right 3 to make them unattackable in pvp so normal admins can fight but players with rights 3 not
moon

item.title: [508] need some help [508]
item.dc:creator: @callum5431 callum5431
item.description:
@callum5431 wrote:

2, yes u can change items

Read full topic
